participant_1.background:
I once drew a picture of the officer as a pig and showed it to him.
I enjoy a fresh cup of coffee every morning and worry about my cats while on tour.
my brother works at best buy.
I enjoy watching my favorite sport, football, on social media.
I've been trying to find ways to relieve my back pain, but nothing seems to work.

participant_2.background:
I remember my mom reading me books when I was little.
when i am not touring with the band , i like to garden.
i m 49 , male and live in dublin , ireland.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
I enjoy a day of fishing on my viking boat.

content.text: Hi, I'm a 26 year old female from the United States. What about you?
Hi there, I'm a 49 year old male from Dublin, Ireland. Where are you from?
I'm from the US! I've always wanted to visit Ireland.
You should come visit sometime! It's a beautiful country.
I hope I get to one day! I love to travel.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, watch movies, and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds nice. I like to garden, cook, and fish.
I love to cook too! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it.
There's nothing better than a home cooked meal.
I agree! Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Toby. He's a very good boy.
I love cats! I have two cats named Milo and Luna.
That's a great name for a cat.
Thank you! I think so too.
